snippet: Evan Longoria and Curt Casali homered off David Price, and the Tampa Bay Rays chased Price, an ex-teammate, in the fourth inning to beat the Red Sox, 12-8.
lead_paragraph: Evan Longoria and Curt Casali homered off David Price, and the Tampa Bay Rays chased Price, an ex-teammate, in the fourth inning to beat the Red Sox, 12-8.

headline.print_headline: Arrieta Picks Up Second No-Hitter as Cubs Stifle Reds
headline.main: Rays Upend Red Sox; Diamondbacks Sweep Giants
